text:
@realDonaldTrump @CNN Hmmm...so #MikePence thinks Americans are dumb & our fault for misunderstanding what #donaldtrump said: "Anybody that wants  a test can get a test."  Added "needs"
#PenceLies

#TrumpLiesPeopleDie
